structure.unit: Inspection Of Boilers, Air Tanks, Etc. Licenses Of Engineers, Firemen, And Operators Of Hoisting Machinery

law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2011. For text effective July 1, 2011, see below.] Every insurance company shall forward to the chief, within fourteen days after each inspection, reports of all boilers inspected by it. Such reports shall be made on blanks approved by the chief, and shall contain all orders made by the company regarding such boilers. Chapter 146: Reports of inspections by insurers [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 68, Sec. 97 effective July 1, 2011. See 2011, 68, Sec. 221. For text effective until July 1, 2011, see above.] Every insurance company shall forward to the chief, within fourteen days after each inspection, reports of all boilers inspected by it. Such reports shall be made in a standard format that has been authorized and approved by the department, and shall contain all orders made by the company regarding such boilers.
